original_title: Something In The Water: A Kinston Basketball Story
overview: 1 in 52 players from Kinston High make it to the NBA, the most per capita in the world. Where basketball provides a way out for many with otherwise limited opportunities, something is definitely in the water in Kinston, NC.
tagline: Kinston, NC. Where 1 in 52 make it to the NBA.
title: Something In The Water: A Kinston Basketball Story
